column1: Little Goat Diner////This place had gotten so much hype
column2: that I HAD to try it. Most of the time
column3: when people hype up a place
column4: I leave a little disappointed...but not Little Goat! This place was outstanding! On a Friday afternoon
column5: this place was PACKED. 1.5 hour wait list and all. Thankfully my husband
column7: and mom were able to scoop a few bar seats and eat there.
